Name of field to read traffic island information from.  Anything other than zero will be treated as traffic island
Specifies additional data fields to set to zero when fixing traffic islands (used for e.g. origin or destination weights)
Specifies numeric data to be preserved by sDNA prepare (preserves values per unit length, averages when merging links)
Specifies numeric data to be preserved by sDNA prepare (preserves absolute values, sums when merging links)
Specifies text data to be preserved (merges if identical, deletes otherwise)
Manual override xy tolerance for fixing endpoint connectivity
Manual override z tolerance for fixing endpoint connectivity
